metadata.title: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator
metadata.subtitle: Manage Microsoft 365 enterprise environments
metadata.description: Master Microsoft 365 administration including Exchange, SharePoint, Teams, and security. Prepare for the MS-102 certification exam.
prerequisites: Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Associate (MS-100 and MS-101)
Understanding of networking and Active Directory concepts

overview.summary: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert training teaches you to design, implement, and manage Microsoft 365 services for enterprise organizations. Learn to optimize Microsoft 365 environments for security, compliance, and productivity.
overview.targetAudience: IT professionals who have Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Associate certification and want to advance to Expert level and prepare for the MS-102 certification exam.

modules.title: Microsoft 365 Service Design and Implementation
modules.description: Design and implement Microsoft 365 services architecture

sections.content:
Enterprise Architecture Design

Learn to design comprehensive Microsoft 365 architectures that meet enterprise requirements for scalability, security, and compliance.

sections.title: Microsoft 365 Services
items: OneDrive for Business for file storage

labs.title: Tenant Configuration Lab
labs.description: Configure and optimize Microsoft 365 tenant settings

sections.content: Security is paramount in Microsoft 365 environments. Learn to implement layered security controls and threat protection mechanisms.

sections.caption: Azure AD, Defender, DLP, and compliance tools

sections.content:
Compliance Framework

Learn to implement compliance solutions that meet regulatory requirements while maintaining productivity and collaboration.
Effective monitoring and troubleshooting are essential for maintaining Microsoft 365 service availability and performance.

instructor.name: Lisa Thompson
instructor.title: Microsoft 365 Solutions Architect
instructor.bio: Lisa is a Microsoft 365 Solutions Architect with extensive experience in enterprise deployments and migrations. She has led numerous Microsoft 365 transformation projects for large organizations.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert
Microsoft Certified: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Associate

certification.name: Microsoft Certified: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert
certification.description: Demonstrate skills in designing, implementing, and managing Microsoft 365 services for enterprise organizations

faq.question: What are the prerequisites for this course?
faq.answer: You must have Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Associate certification (MS-100 and MS-101) or equivalent experience.

faq.question: What Microsoft 365 services are covered?
faq.answer: You'll learn to manage Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, Teams, OneDrive, Azure AD, Intune, and security services.

faq.question: Is this course technical or strategic?
faq.answer: This course covers both technical implementation and strategic design decisions for enterprise Microsoft 365 deployments.

faq.question: Do I need Windows Server experience?
faq.answer: Yes, experience with Windows Server administration and Active Directory concepts is required for this advanced course.
